amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that authorizes waivers of secondary treatment requirements for sewage treatment plants in certain coastal communities which discharge into ocean water.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 45 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to delete the provisions of the bill that authorize waivers of secondary treatment requirements for sewage treatment plants in certain coastal communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 267 (Roll no. 315).
